title: Warden Sivir reminds me of Maiev Shadowsong from World of Warcraft... Sorta...

replies.body:
Does Sivir stealth during the night? No (well tbh we don't know there is no night on SR).
Does Sivir toss a barrage of knives around her? No
Does Sivir blink? No.
Does Sivir single target DoT? No.
Does Sivir summon a dark avatar of vengeance to fight with her (and summon invulnerable units from friendly corpses)? No.

Does Sivir look remotely like her with by having a helmet or cape? No.

So where does Sivir actually resembles Maiev? Her weapon, and that's about it I think.

:p
Sivir can potato and so does Maiev, The logic is there.
